DefuatDecentralizedContent: Decentralized Reserve Currency Protocol Based on Algorithmic Non-Stable Coin RAI
DefuatRelyingOn: Relying on the innovative DeFi protocol, Raifi combines the RWA framework, modular blockchain, decentralized lending mechanism and meta-universe ecosystem to create a fully integrated financial solution.
RaiIntroducesProtocol: RAIFI implements Protocol Owned Liquidity, decreasing dependence on liquidity mining and external liquidity providers.
TheRBSMechanism: The Range Stabilization Mechanism stabilizes RAI's price within a set range, independent of fiat currency fluctuations.
UsersCanBorrowAgainst: Users can borrow against RAI's reserve assets at very low interest rates, offering significant financial flexibility.
ThesRAIWill: sRAI holders can engage in governance, enabling community members to influence key decisions regarding the protocol.
BlockchainRWA: Combining RWA with RaiFi to achieve decentralized liquidity and stability.
LiquidityGuarantees: Liquidity Assurance: POL mechanisms ensure robust liquidity support.
PriceStabilization: Price Stability: RBS implements a structured price stabilization framework
LongTermValue: Sustainable Value: Backed by reserve assets for long-term stability.
EfficientUseOfCapital: Capital Efficiency: POL mechanisms optimize liquidity utilization.
BlockchainMetaverse: Blockchain Metaverse and RaiFi Unite to Build a Decentralized Economy
VirtualLandLending: Virtual Land Lending: Unlock liquidity through land mortgaging
DecentralizedStore: Decentralized Commerce: RAI powers virtual stores within the metaverse
IdentityManagement: Identity Management: Secure and decentralized authentication for users
LiquidityBonus: Liquidity Boost: Enhancing metaverse market liquidity through RaiFi integration
EnhanceTheFlexibility: Strengthening Financial Flexibility and Stability through Decentralized Liquidity, Smart Contract Automation, and Cross-Chain Asset Management
ModularLending: Modular Lending: Empowering flexible loans with Cooler Loans integration.
PluggableLiquidity: Adaptive Liquidity: POL ensures dynamic and managed liquidity.
ModuleIncentives: Incentive Modules: Decentralized incentives for ecosystem participation.

FirstTimeClaimContribution:
First time Claim Contribution Reward ?
Please approve RAIFI to use your WU2U for claim contribution reward.
NoteStake: Note: There are two warm-up staking periods, and users must stake for more than two periods to receive funds. Users will accumulate rewards during the warm-up period but cannot claim them within two periods. When two periods have passed, your preheating balance can be withdrawn from the preheating contract to your wallet, and you continue to receive rebase rewards.
TipToClaim: Tip: To claim the APY, you must destroy the corresponding amount of WU2U
MaximumStakedPrincipalContributionValue: Maximum Staked Principal for Contribution Value
Tips1: 1. If the stake base is greater than the contribution factor, the reward will be issued normally; otherwise, the reward will stop. Destruction will increase the pledge base.
Tips2: 2. When the contribution factor exceeds the staking base, the staking principal can be increased to earn contribution rewards.
Tips3: 3. When the contribution factor exceeds four times the maximum staking principal, RAI must be burned to reduce the contribution factor in order to continue earning contribution rewards.
Tips4: 4. The maximum value of the staking base is equal to four times the maximum staking principal.
TheServiceProvidedPancakeSwap: The service is provided by Grofidex for trading depth.
